Introduction

Ling Qi is a member of the boy group FANTASY BOYS under PocketDol Studios.

He is best known for being a contestant on the Chinese survival show Idol Producer and Korean survival show Fantasy Boys. His finishing rank in Fantasy Boys was #5.

He made his first debut in 2017 as member of Chinese group X-TIME and it's sub-unit, UNIT-T.

On January 14th, 2024, he debuted in a co-ed collaboration project called "A SIX" group consisting of multiple PocketDol Studios artists.
